name: The Farm
description:
• The Farm is a farm management game with a princess as the main character.
    You can experience the process of the princess running the farm and the episode that occurs while managing the farm.
    It is composed of cute 2D graphics and can be played with simple operation.

  • The Farm has ported the version released on mobile to PC, and there are changes accordingly.
    It supports controllers that can be used on a PC, and supports graphic settings suitable for PC screens.

  • Indonesian is not on the list of supported languages, but can be used by changing the language setting in the game.
